1_Remazim.78: Not to eat something that has a mixture of chametz, as it is stated (Exodus 112:20), “You shall eat nothing leavened.” In these laws, we have explained the laws of chametz, its mixture and the purging of vessels that have absorbed chametz.

41.0: Laws of Shofar - It is a positive commandment to sound the shofar on Rosh Hashana, as the Torah states "A day of Teruah it shall be for you".
